abstract.text: Authenticate users, and search for contact information in Open Directory and LDAP directories.
object serves as a Cocoa wrapper for an Open Directory node.
object serves as a Cocoa wrapper for an Open Directory query.
Creates a query object with provided parameters.
Returns an autoreleased query object created with provided parameters.
Information about an error condition including a domain, a domain-specific error code, and application-specific information.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
